title: Is it permissible to work in company that earns 80% from halal things & 20% from haram Assimalhakeem
transcript: Daniel shamsin if a business has 80% income from Halal items and 20% income from tobacco products like cigarettes is it permissible to work in such a company it depends a what is your job for example if you're working in the grocery section or in the vegetables and fruit section or in the meat section where you have nothing to do with the cigarettes or intoxicants or pork or whatever Haram products yes you can work there but if you're the cashier and you actually receive money for Halal and Haram items this is totally prohibited for you to work there the next
